physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination revealed bilaterally erythematous, edematous, and tender auricles, with cervical lymphadenopathy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At one-month follow-up, the patient was markedly improved.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination revealed bilaterally reddened and thickened auricles and pinnae.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms stopped after treatment with dapsone at 100 mg/day.
